title: Fitness Center, Pet-Friendly Community with Bark Park
map_address: 474 S Wright St near West Virgina Ave
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 48', 'OR Text', '48', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 670 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features:', 'Beautiful 1- and 2-Bedroom Newly Renovated Apartments, Vinyl Hardwood Floors and Carpeting, Updated Kitchens with Espresso or White Cabinetry and a Full Suite of Appliances', 'Community Amenities:', 'Sparkling Heated Swimming Pool (Summer), Pet-Friendly Community with Bark Park, On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance and 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, Fitness Center', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Income Requirements:', 'Income that grosses at 2.5 times monthly rent', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', '8S7vA5WM']
